property.name: Keywords
property.value: Private-Holy Ground

property.name: Text
property.value: Raise the controller’s hand size by one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job: Mark the town square. If successful, gain 4 ghost rock. If not, each player with a dude in the opposing posse gains 4 ghost rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Move your dude from one in-town deed you own to another in-town deed you own (without booting). Make another Noon play.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job, Boot: Mark a Holy Ground deed. If successful, discard all Abominations and wanted dudes at that deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: React Hex 6, Boot: When you reveal your draw hand in a shootout, boot this Huckster. Ace a card in your draw hand. Replace it with a card from your play hand.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: If Allie is at the town square, she permanently gets 1 control point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job, Boot: Mark a dude. If the mark is not wanted, raise the bounty on each dude in your posse by 1. If successful, ace the mark.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deputy-Mad Scientist 0

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Choose another player’s dude at a deed you own but don’t control. Gain ghost rock equal to that dude’s influence.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Pull, Boot: When a dude is discarded (not aced) as a casualty in a shootout, if the pull is higher than the dude’s value, send that dude home booted instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Choose a deed in play. It becomes Private. If you own and control that deed, gain 1 ghost rock for each dude controlled by another player at that deed.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Improvement-Gadget-Difficulty 7

property.name: Text
property.value: After this is invented, attach it to a Ranch that you control. Controller Noon, Boot: Gain 1 ghost rock.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Weapon-Gadget-Difficulty 7

property.name: Text
property.value: You may equip this Gadget as a Shootout play (pay all costs). When forming a shootout hand, when you redraw after discarding at least one card, you may draw one extra card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Harrowed-Huckster 0

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Raise or lower the bounty on a wanted dude by one (if the bounty goes to zero, the dude is no longer wanted).

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Boot:Put 1 Bounty on a wanted dude.||Boot: Remove one Bounty from a wanted dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Choose a wanted dude. That dude gets +3 bullets and is a stud. If the dude is discarded or aced, the player responsible gains 4 extra ghost rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players cannot take ghost rock from the Bank’s controller.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: If you reveal a cheatin’ hand in Barton’s shootout, raise your draw hand rank by 1 for this round..

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Private-Ranch-Out of Town

property.name: Text
property.value: Private • Ranch Out of Town

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex 9, Boot: A dude at this or an adjacent location gets –1 influence and –1 bullets. Shootout Hex 9, Boot: One opposing dude gets –2 bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sidekick (This card can be discarded to cover one casualty.) Noon, Boot: Move this dude to the same location as a wanted dude.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: Bobo gains a bullet bonus equal to the highest Huckster skill rating in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin’ Resolution:Discard the cheatin’ player’s draw hand and replace it with the top five cards of your deck (those cards still go to your discard pile).

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: A 2-stud Gunslinger token enters play at a wanted dude’s location. The Gunslinger calls out that dude, who cannot refuse. Remove the Gunslinger token from the game after the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this dude is adjacent to the location of a shootout or a job’s mark, they can join a posse, without moving or booting, even if booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dudes with 0 or 1 influence, excluding any modifiers from this deed, have +1 influence while at this deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Shootout, Boot: Move your dude into your posse from any location.

property.name: Text
property.value: This deed has 1 control point if another Ranch is in play. All dudes have their value raised by 3 while at this deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Raise or lower the bullets of a dude at this location by 2.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Noon,Boot:Raise the bullet of a dude at this location||Noon,Boot:Lower the bullet of a dude at this location

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Pay 5 ghost rock to lower a player’s draw hand by 2 ranks. Cheatin’ Resolution: Lower a player’s draw hand by 2 ranks.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: onPlay[Resolution: Pay 5 ghost rock to lower a player’s draw hand by 2 ranks.|-|Cheatin’ Resolution: Lower a player’s draw hand by 2 ranks.]

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: If you have 3 or fewer cards in your play hand, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Move your dude to a deed that you own but do not control.

property.name: Text
property.value: While in a Saloon you own, Clementine gets +1 influence and cannot be called out.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Clyde calls out a dude at his location. A wanted dude cannot refuse the call out.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin’ Resolution: The cheatin’ player must boot one of their dudes. If in a shootout, that dude gets aced instead. If you have a legal hand, you choose the dude to boot or ace.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: You may use shoppin’ as a Shootout play, and at any location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Determine control of this deed using bullets instead of influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: After this dude makes a pull, discard the pull to replace it with this card. Resolution Boot: Discard a card from your draw hand to replace it with this card. If the discarded card was a 2, raise your hand rank by one.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 0

property.name: Text
property.value: If you discard Dawn as a casualty, you may search your deck for Eve Henry (if you don’t already have her in play), and play her for free at this location. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 2

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Pull: Choose your dude with a Weapon Gadget in this shootout. If the pull is a club, discard that dude. Otherwise, that Gadget gets +3 bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job: Mark an in-town deed. If successful, the deed permanently gains 1 control point.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you discard Eve as a casualty, you may search your deck for Dr. Dawn Edwards (if you don’t already have her in play), and play her for free at this location. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Choose a deed that you control but do not own. Gain ghost rock equal to its production.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Weapon-Gadget-Difficulty 8

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude is a stud. Shootout, Pay 1–3 Ghost Rock, Boot: Raise the bullets on this Gadget by 1 for each ghost rock spent. Each round’s loser takes 1 extra casualty.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gadget-Difficulty 5

property.name: Text
property.value: Repeat Resolution, Pay X Ghost Rock: Raise your draw hand rank by X for this round, but not to exceed your opponent’s hand rank.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Fred’s influence is equal to his bounty.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Unboot all your Horses at one location. Any abilities on the Horses that have been used can be used an extra time.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Attach a goods or spell (as shoppin’), reducing the cost of that card by 2 ghost rock.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Private-Holy Ground

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Ace a card from your hand to gain 1 ghost rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Choose a dude’s ability that has been used. That ability can be used another time.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 2

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Discard a card from your hand to get a non-Weapon Gadget from your discard pile. Show the card and add it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Discard a Hex from your dude in this posse to raise your draw hand rank by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Choose one of your dudes. Other players cannot choose or affect that dude with Shootout abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Place a dude from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After you take casualties forlosing a round of a shootout, pull. For each dude you have (still in the posse) with a value higher than the pull, the winner takes 1 casualty.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Irving joins a posse, gain 1 ghost rock.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Abomination-Huckster 2

property.name: Text
property.value: While he has a Hex, Ivor gets +1 bullets, +1 influence, and +1 Huckster skill.

property.value: Private-Strike-Out of Town

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 0

property.name: Text
property.value: When James enters a posse, place 4 ghost rock on him. The ghost rock may be used to pay for Shootout abilities (it is not a bounty). Discard his unused ghost rock after the shootout.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: If Jarrett has a Horse, swap him with one of your dudes in the posse (Jarrett joins the posse. The other dude moves to Jarrett’s location and is no longer in the posse).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.value: Huckster 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Attach a Hex to Jia Mein (paying all costs) to make him a stud.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card is only used for draw hands and pulls. You choose its suit and value. Ace the joker after use.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card is only used for draw hands and pulls. You choose its suit and value. Ace the joker after use.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Unboot Jon’s Horse. You may use the Horse’s ability an additional time.

property.value: Huckster 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Other wanted dudes in Jonah’s posse get +1 bullets.

property.value: Noon Job, Boot: Harry leads a job that marks a wanted dude. If successful, ace the mark.

property.name: Outfit

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Move Kevin (without booting) to the same location as a Huckster. Kevin becomes a stud.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job, Boot: Mark a dude. Your posse must have more total bullets than the marked dude. Raise the bounty of each dude in your posse by 1. If successful, discard the mark.

property.name: Text
property.value: The controller of this deed may discard one additional card each Sundown phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: You can discard as many of your cards as you like during Sundown.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lane gets +2 bullets while he has a Horse.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Choose a dude. Boot your dudes with a total influence greater than the chosen dude’s influence to raise that dude’s bounty by 1.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: If Lawrence is at a deed you do not own, he is worth 1 control point while he stays at that deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Pull, Boot: If the pull is lower than this dude’s bullets, ace one dude in the opposing posse.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: If your opponent in Lucy’s shootout reveals a cheatin’ hand, raise the bounty on each dude in their posse by 1 (including from 0 to 1).

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin’ Resolution: Discard a spell from your dude in this posse and pull. Your draw hand rank equals the value of your pull (to a 0 maximum rank of 11).

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Reduce a dude’s bullets by their influence. The dude’s controller may move them home booted (even if already booted).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Marion gets +2 bullets while he is wanted.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Max is worth 1 control point while you control 2 or more Ranches. Your other dudes at Ranches get +1 influence and +3 value.

property.value: Horse-Gadget-Difficulty 5

property.name: Text
property.value: Repeat Noon, Pay 2 Ghost Rock: Move this dude. React, Boot: Prevent this dude from booting when they join a posse (this does not let a booted dude join a posse).

property.value: Noon: Boot a Hex on Micah to move him (without booting).

property.value: Shootout: Discard a Hex from Mongwau to make him a stud.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Boot one of your dudes to play a deed, reducing the deed’s cost by the dude’s influence. Move that dude to that deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Move this dude (without booting).

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Draw a card. Cheatin' Resolution: Gain 3 ghost rock.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: onPlay[Noon: Draw a card.|-|Cheatin' Resolution: Gain 3 ghost rock.]

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin’ Resolution, Boot: One card in your draw hand changes to the suit and value of your choice.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Private-Strike-Out of Town

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude cannot be changed to a draw, and cannot have their bullets lowered by another player’s Shootout ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude is a stud.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller React, Boot: After a shootout starts but before any player makes a Shootout play, make a Shootout play.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time a player reveals a cheatin’ hand and your hand is legal, you may discard a card from your play hand to draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Choose a dude. They must be selected as the first casualty. If that dude is chosen as the shooter, they get –3 bullets (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Boot: Move this dude into a posse (without booting; this can move a booted dude).

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot your dude in this posse to send a dude in the other posse home booted. Your dude gets –1 bullets (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Boot your stud dude in this posse. Your opponent must ace a dude in their posse with lower bullets than your dude’s bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Discard a card to draw a card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Prescott’s bullets and influence are equal to the number of Law Dogs at his location (including himself).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Discard a Gadget from Eustace to move him to another location (without booting).

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin’ Resolution, Boot: If you have a legal draw hand, exchange draw hands with the cheatin’ player. Cheatin’ cards cannot be played on you for this round of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Move your dude from this location to another location (without booting).

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Hex 8, Boot: Ace a card from your play hand. One Abomination from your Boot Hill enters play (pay all costs) and joins this Huckster’s posse. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever Ramiro joins a posse, pay 1 ghost rock. If you do not or cannot pay, discard him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job: Mark the town square (any player may oppose the job). If successful, put a dude or deed into play from your discard pile, reducing its cost by 5 ghost rock.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Pay 1–4 Ghost Rock: Rémy gets +1 bullets for each ghost rock spent, to a maximum rating of 5 bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Gain 1 ghost rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: Prevent this dude from booting when they join a posse (this does not allow a booted dude to join a posse).

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Choose a dude. That dude gets –1 influence while at any location except home.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Choose any number of your dudes, each with a Horse, at one location. Move them to an adjacent location that has an opposing dude without a Horse. Boot that dude. You may call that dude out.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Call out a dude at this deed. If Sanford is wanted, the call-out cannot be refused.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex 7, Boot: Move this Huckster to any location. Shootout Hex 7, Boot: Move this Huckster to join your posse. You may make another Shootout play.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: If your opponent in Dave’s shootout reveals a cheatin’ hand and you do not, your dudes cannot be casualties this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Boot: Choose and ace an opposing dude in this shootout with a value less than or equal to this dude’s bullets.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Silas’s bullets are equal to his bounty.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Sloane’s bounty cannot be reduced below 1. Sloane and your other dudes at her location do not boot when forming or joining a posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Hex X, Boot: Choose a dude in this shootout. X is that dude’s grit. If successful, send the dude home booted. If successful by 6 or more, ace the dude instead. If unsuccessful, move this Huckster home booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller React, Boot: When you bring a non-token dude into play, place that dude at any location you control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 2

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Choose a dude in this shootout. That dude gets –2 bullets (minimum 0) and becomes a draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After you take casualties for losing a round of a shootout, your opponent takes 1 casualty unless each dude in their posse has higher bullets than the highest bullets among your casualties.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Choose a dude that was brought into play this Noon phase. Gain ghost rock equal to the dude’s influence.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: After your dude succeeds at a spell pull while not at home, you may discard a card from your hand to gain 1 ghost rock and draw a card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Put The Ghostly Gun into your draw hand; he becomes the suit and value of your choice. Discard a card from your draw hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Raise or lower the skill rating of a dude at this location by 2 (the skills are Huckster, Blessed, Shaman, and Mad Scientist).

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Raise the skill rating of a dude at this location by 2||Lower the skill rating of a dude at this location by 2

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Unboot a dude.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Boot your dude in the town square. If that dude is still in the town square during the Sundown phase, either gain 1 ghost rock per other player, or your dude permanently gets 1 control point if they do not already have one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Move one of your dudes into your posse. That dude becomes a stud.

property.name: Text
property.value: Government • Controller React, Boot: At the start of the Upkeep phase, choose a dude at this location. Lower that dude’s upkeep by their influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Choose your dude at this location and pay any amount of ghost rock. Each other player may then pay any amount of ghost rock. If you paid at least 4 ghost rock more than any other player, your dude permanently gets 1 control point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot your dude at a deed you don’t own to take ghost rock from the owner up to the production of that deed. Raise the bounty on your dude by the amount of ghost rock taken.

property.name: Text
property.value: Wanted dudes cannot refuse a call-out from this dude.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: If your opponent in Tommy’s shootout reveals a cheatin’ hand, raise your draw hand rank by 1 for this round. If your draw hand is also legal, raise your hand rank by 2 instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Grifter (You may only have one Grifter in your starting posse.) React, Boot: At the start of the game, shuffle your play hand into your deck and draw 5 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Choose a Private deed you own. Other players’ dudes there must move home booted, or gain 1 bounty each.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination Other players cannot choose or affect your Hucksters at this location with action cards if they could legally choose to affect Tyxarglenak instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: This deed’s controller gains 2 ghost rock each time a dude is aced.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot a dude and their attached cards. That dude gets –1 bullets and cannot use abilities. Their attached cards lose all traits, abilities, and bullet bonuses.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: One of your dudes gets +2 bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Boot this dude and discard a card from your hand to draw a card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Boot: Send an opposing dude home booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Raise a dude’s influence by 1.
